aihc provide baige training task management capabilities.

 Find more information at: xxxxxxxx
 
Resources Management Commands:
  pool       Manage resources related to resourcepools 
  queue      Manage resources related to queue
  job        Manage resources related to training tasks
  logs       Print logs of training task

Other Commands:
  config     Modify the configuration file
  version    Display the version information
  help       Help imformation
  
Usage:
  aihc [commands] [flags]
